src:
Oppositionen behöver en ekonomisk politik
LEDARE. Den här helgen samlas Kristdemokraterna till riksting i Umeå. Moderaterna har nyligen haft sin stämma. Och Sverigedemokraterna har sin motsvarighet i Örebro senare i november.
07 Nov 2019, 14:48 by Tobias Wikström

text:
The opposition needs an economic policy
LEADER. This weekend, the Christian Democrats will gather for the national assembly in Umeå. The Moderates have recently had their vote. And the Swedish Democrats have their counterpart in Örebro later in November.
07 Nov 2019, 14:48 by Tobias Wikström
